title: CasperGo

steps.title: Advanced Account Options
steps.text: Would you like to manage your Secret Phrase (including importing a prior one)?

steps.title: Create or Import?
steps.text: Would you like to create a new wallet or use your existing Secret Phrase to restore an old one?

steps.title: READ THIS
steps.text: This is your Secret Phrase. It will be the ONLY way to access your wallet. Save it in a safe place and never online or on your computer. Click here for help.

steps.title: Import Wallet
steps.text: Enter your Secret Phrase to import your wallet and transaction history.

steps.title: Multi Factor Authentication
steps.text: You can use various types of MFA (Multi Factor Authentication) to make your account more secure.  We offer the following solutions to ensure your wallet is protected.

steps.title: CasperGo OTP Device
steps.text: You have received the CasperGo Token in the Mail and are ready to activate it on your account! Please turn the device over and enter the serial number shown.

steps.title: Google Authenticator / Authy / Etc.
steps.text: If you have a 2FA app such as Google Authenticator or Authy, use it now by scanning this QR Code.  Or click on it if you are on a mobile device.

steps.title: PIN Code
steps.text: You can secure your account with a PIN code.  Choose a 6 digit code (numbers only.)

steps.title: Usernames ... so easy
steps.text: Please enter a username you would like to use from 5-30 characters and/or numbers. After choosing an username, we will verify if you can use it (if it's not already taken)!

steps.title: Select currency
steps.text: Select your preferred govt currency such as USD, EURO, etc.

steps.title: All Done
steps.text: You can now close this window and continue in ROUTE_NAME

steps.title: Confirm 2FA Code
steps.text: Please confirm the code appearing in your app.

steps.title: Confirm 2FA Code
steps.text: Please confirm the code appearing in your app to open the settings.

savePhrase: Save this Secret Phrase in a safe location.  If you lose it, you can lose access to your wallet.  Also, anyone with this Secret Phrase can have access to your wallet.  You can use this Secret Phrase to recover your wallet.
phraseSaved: I have saved this in a safe location!
usernameNotAvailable:
‚ö†Ô∏è The username USERNAME is not available.
Please choose another.
iHaveDiviGoToken: I have a CasperGo OTP Device
usePINCode: I want to use a PIN Code
advancedReadyText: There is nothing left to do here, you are all set! Please continue in ROUTE_NAME
